segments.text: The kitchen has this warm light from the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, so methodical and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of clean bowls sit on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is filling up with running water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's starting to overflow onto the floor in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She steps right into it without a second thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the other side, the boy's climbing the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching to get into the cookie jar up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, hand raised in excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're giggling inside, I bet, sharing the fun secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window looks inviting with its path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Though the stool does seem a bit unsteady under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope their adventure doesn't end with a splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's cute how they're teaming up for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is full of little surprises.
segments.speaker: PAR
